channel.title: Deploying ROSA in STS mode on Managed OpenShift Black Belt - Unofficial Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Deploying ROSA in STS mode on Managed OpenShift Black Belt - Unofficial Documentation

item.title: ROSA Prerequisites
item.description: This document contains a set of pre-requisites that must be run once before you can create your first ROSA cluster. Prerequisites AWS an AWS account with the AWS ROSA Prerequisites met. AWS CLI MacOS See AWS Docs for alternative install options. Install AWS CLI using the macOS command line curl "https://awscli.amazonaws.com/AWSCLIV2.pkg" -o "AWSCLIV2.pkg" sudo installer -pkg AWSCLIV2.pkg -target / Linux See AWS Docs for alternative install options. Install AWS CLI using the Linux command line
